thread.title: Pregnant Billie Faiers shows off her huge baby bump and reveals she's due in just one month
thread.title_full: Pregnant Billie Faiers shows off her huge baby bump and reveals she's due in just one month

author: Joshua Haigh
title: Pregnant Billie Faiers shows off her huge baby bump and reveals she's due in just one month
text:
Pregnant Billie Faiers shows off her huge baby bump and reveals she's due in just one month The TOWIE babe is preparing to welcome the latest addition to her family Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Billie Faiers has given fans a glimpse of her growing baby bump. 
The former TOWIE star, who's baby is due in just a one month, isn't shy about giving fans a look at her pregnant belly. 
Choosing to relax in the sun on holiday before she has to deal with the stress of a new baby, Billie showed off her curves in a skimpy bikini. 
It comes as Billie gave us serious family goals when she shared an adorable video recently. 
The star shared a super cute clip of her fiancé Greg Shepherd and their daughter Nelly playing. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Billie Faiers posts funny vid of her daughter and fiance Share this video Watch Next 
In a bit of a role reversal, Greg is sat on Nelly's tiny bike - complete with stabilisers - as the two-year-old attempted to push him along the path from behind. 
Lifting his feet off the ground, his sweet daughter proved she's stronger than she looks as she manages to push her dad along as he screamed 'yay' in delight. Read More Nelly is stronger than she looks! (Photo: Instagram/billiefaiersofficial) Billie and Nelly pose with sister Sam and her son Paul (Photo: WireImage) 
The gorgeous toddler proudly looked up at the camera in delight. 
She gave her dad a talk about staying safe though. She took full precautions by wearing a crash helmet, while he hadn't bothered to put one on. Tut tut, Greg! 
Billie's fans expressed their delight at being able to share the sweet family moment. Greg looks like a doting dad in the clip (Photo: Instagram/billiefaiersofficial) Billie and Greg are expecting their second child (Photo: Xposure) 
One wrote: "Oh look at her !!! She's taken it all so seriously #bless" 
Another commented: "poor Nelly! This is hilarious" 
And another wrote: "This is adorable" 
Pregnant Billie recently spoke of her shock after finding out the sex of her second baby, which is due in spring. Read More Nelly looks very pleased with herself (Photo: Instagram/billiefaiersofficial) She's very close to her daddy (Photo: Instagram/billiefaiersofficial) 
The 26-year-old and her partner were delighted to find out they were having a boy. 
"We're so excited. We're in complete shock. Greg and I always thought we'd just have girls and everyone around us put that in our heads too," she said. 
While she was happy to have daughters – as they'd be like her and her sister Sam Faiers – she said Greg was secretly happy to be having a son. Billie's second baby is due in spring (Photo: Billiefaiers/instagram) She's having a boy this time (Photo: Billiefaiers/instagram) 
"We couldn't stop laughing during the scan. I said to the sonographer, 'No! Are you sure? Can you check again?' She checked a few times so it's definitely a boy. 
"We can't stop smiling. Greg is so excited because every man would like a boy. Greg got quite emotional but he's over the moon." Like us on Facebook
